ygData.subject: Re: Eruds Tonic In possesion!
ygData.msgSnippet: Could it be related to the fact that a kiss could be the drink known as a kiss ?  (big hint, huh?) -Ulfin, monk 10th Circle, Veeshan
ygData.messageBody:
Could it be related to the fact that a "kiss" could be the drink known as a
"kiss"? (big hint, huh?)

-Ulfin, monk 10th Circle, Veeshan
